item.title: Pomegranate Brownies
item.description: These are my first ever brownies and first ever cake I have attempted, But I had a lot of help from Michael Oliver. This recipe belongs to him. Pomegranate brownies Ingredients 1/2 cup olive oil 1 1/4 cup organic raw cane sugar 3/4 cup cacao powder 1/2 teaspoon sea salt 1/2 vanilla pod-scraped (or 1/2 tsp of vanilla paste) 2 large eggs 1/3 cup sifted Flour 1/2 cup pomegranate seeds 2 tablespoons cacao nibs flaky salt Apparatus parchment paper large mixing bowl whisk spoon baking dish toothpick paring knife Method Preheat the oven to 170 degrees and line an 8 x 8 baking dish with parchment paper.
